backgroundStrain._instruction: Add the background strain that explains the majority of the genetic background and/or causes the majority of the prominent traits. If two strains contributed equally, state both.

breedingType._instruction: Add the breeding type for this strain.

description._instruction: Enter a short text describing this strain.

diseaseModel._instruction: If applicable, add what human disease(s) or condition(s) this strain is a model for.

geneticStrainType._instruction: Add the genetic background type of this strain.

identifier._instruction: Enter one or several identifiers for this strain excluding ontological identifers or RRIDs (e.g. from Mouse Genome Informatics (MGI) or Rat Genome Database (RGD)).

laboratoryCode._instruction: Enter the laboratory code assigned by the Institute of Laboratory Animal Research (ILAR) for the investigator or organization that has created this strain.

name._instruction: Enter the name of this strain.

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier(s) (IRI) of the related ontological term(s) matching this strain.

phenotype._instruction: Enter a short text describing the phenotype of this strain.

RRID._instruction: Add the 'Research Resource Identifiers' (RRID) for this strain.

species._instruction: Add the species of this strain.

stockNumber._instruction: Add the stock number from the vendor the strain was supplied from/is in stock at.

synonym._instruction: Enter one or several synonyms (inlcuding abbreviations) for this strain.
